module.name: sips - atos worldine
module.description: The module Sips (Atos Worldline) for PrestaShop is a remote payment solution designed to provide a very high level of security and to allow customers to use all of its functionalities with all distanc
module.description_full: The module Sips (Atos Worldline) for PrestaShop is a remote payment solution designed to provide a very high level of security and to allow customers to use all of its functionalities with all distance selling channels. PayLib and 3D Secure included.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: seo (search engine optimization)
module.description: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.description_full: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.additional_description:
This module allows you to optimize your SEO in a few clicks. Very easy to use, this module will fill automatically all the essential Meta tags for a good search engine optimization, whatever the number of your products. You will have unique tags for each of your pages and keywords that fit exactly your products.
The visibility is a key success factor for an online store. Many studies revealed that approximately 85% of the Internet users do not go beyond the first result page. This proves that without a good SEO, nobody will find your products.
Reach your objectives with this worthy module! Essential for any good merchant!﻿﻿
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: google shopping
module.description:
Easily export your entire catalog to Google Shopping, the new price comparison service developed by Google!
Note: A subscription to a third party service is required in order to use the module
module.description_full:
Easily export your entire catalog to Google Shopping, the new price comparison service developed by Google!
Note: A subscription to a third party service is required in order to use the module. Please subscribe to this service before making a purchase. ﻿
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: cartabandonment
module.description: An abandoned cart no longer means a lost sale! Remind your clients that they left items in their shopping cart with automatic personalized emails
module.description_full: An abandoned cart no longer means a lost sale! Remind your clients that they left items in their shopping cart with automatic personalized emails.﻿
module.additional_description:
Each time a customer creates a shopping cart but does not make the final purchase, an email is automatically sent to remind and encourage them to complete their order. The benefits are numerous and it’s easy to use!
Send one or more automatic personalized emails to your customers to remind them of the contents of their cart to turn an abandoned cart into a sale Utilize coupons and discounts to encourage customers to complete their order Easily create email templates tailored to your online store Track the conversion rate of your various emails through detailed statistics that you can follow in your back office. See what your customers best respond to! Default email text is available in English and French to guide you in creating your templates. Simply customize them to your liking!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: rich menu
module.description: Create and manage effectively your menu and all your navigation bars thanks to the module Rich Menu developed by PrestaShop!﻿
module.description_full: Create and manage effectively your menu and all your navigation bars thanks to the module Rich Menu developed by PrestaShop!﻿
module.additional_description: Create innovative menus with unlimited features with this module. Generate additional revenue through advertisements that you can embed in each category! This module include more than 150 features to create menus that will perfectly suit all your needs. Give a high visibility to your categories and your products, simplify the user experience on your online store and increase your transformation rate!﻿﻿
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: newsletter & statistics
module.description: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy
module.description_full: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy to send your customers gorgeous newsletters that keeps them coming back to shop! You can count on this module to do all the hard work for you!
module.additional_description:
Track your stats: Every detail about your newsletter is available for you to review. This allows merchants to monitor what is and isn't a working to improve future newsletters over time.
Additional benefits include:
Personalized Newsletter Build customer loyalty Build your brand Stay in touch with your customers Provide a medium to inform customers about sales, announcements, new inventory, etc.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.description: PayPal Pro allows you to start accepting credit card transactions immediately while providing your customers with one of the world's most trusted online payment solutions
module.description_full: PayPal Pro allows you to start accepting credit card transactions immediately while providing your customers with one of the world's most trusted online payment solutions. PayPal Pro creates a streamlined checkout process that allows customers to pay for products online with one simple click of the mouse. ﻿
module.author: PrestaShop
